title: So when can i get hextech rewards again
body: So I got a 10 game chat restriction, played my 10 game with it only to find out even after it ends I still cant get hextech gear so how long do I need to wait until I can get it again.

replies.body:
"Eligibility is dependent on a consistent display of good sportsmanship, not just 'be nice in X number of games or days.' Negative behavior during this reform period will cause it to last longer."
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions

that's fucking stupid, iv done my punishment and I still have restrictions that's just bs. How does that even work just say iv good all week then in 1 game I get reported for being toxic does that suddenly extend my restrictions. On top of that how long is the reform period generally.

Hextech loot is a system designed to reward players for their positive behavior, and is, therefore, a privilege and not a right. For this reason, a trend of consistently good behaviour must be seen on your account before you'll earn loot back. 

There's no way to calculate or directly know how long the reform period is, as that information could be used to work around the system. I definitely recommend checking out the [Loot Restrictions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions) we've written.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
